title: Found
body:
<<nameTag Guards >>
Stop Right There!
<<nameTag Player >>
Oh no... I have to find a way to go around him.

title: Start_Prisoner_1
body:
<<nameTag Jeff>>
You have finally wake up.
<<nameTag Player>>
uh... Who am I?
<<nameTag Jeff >>
What!? You lose your memory?
<<nameTag Player>>
I guess so...
<<nameTag Jeff>>
sigh... You were the most powerful knight in this world. But You got betrayed by your friend.
<<nameTag Player>>
UHHHHH, I... I remember...
<<nameTag Jeff>>
I think you should try to escape my friend.
<<nameTag Player>>
sure, lets do it!!!
